Package hjb.misc

Contains miscellaneous classes used throughout the various hjb subpackages.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
HJBStrings HJBStrings provides access to the message resources used in the hjb subpackages.
YetAnotherBase64 YetAnotherBase64 translates byte arrays into Base64 encoded strings and vice versa as described in rfc3548.
 

Exception Summary
HJBClientException HJBClientException is used to report those problems that would stop processing of a request by HJB when those problems are due to the invalid contents of the request.
HJBException HJBException is used to report any general problems that would stop processing of a request by HJB.
HJBNotFoundException HJBClientException is used to report any problems that would stop processing of a request to a HJB server when those problems are caused by an expected resource being unavailable.
 

Package hjb.misc Description

Contains miscellaneous classes used throughout the various hjb subpackages.

HJBException, HJBClientException, HJBNotFoundException are runtime exceptions used to signal problems during processing of a JMSCommand.

HJBStrings provides support for i18n and l11n across HJB. YetAnotherBase64 provides support for encoding/decoding byte arrays to Strings.
